sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_305042ad4f100300cee253418110c7ab
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.nutanixssp_variable_substitution</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>nutanixssp_variable_substitution</name><script><![CDATA[var nutanixssp_variable_substitution = Class.create();
nutanixssp_variable_substitution.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	initialize: function() {
		this.substitute_string = "";
		this.properties = new Packages.java.util.Properties();
	},
	
	addProperty: function(name, value) {
		this.properties.put(name, value);
	},
	
	setSubstitutionString: function(substitute_string) {
		this.substitute_string = substitute_string;
	},
	
	getSubstitutedString: function() {
		return GlideStringUtil.substituteVariables(this.substitute_string, this.properties);
	},
		
    type: 'nutanixssp_variable_substitution'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-07-31 13:43:05</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>305042ad4f100300cee253418110c7ab</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>nutanixssp_variable_substitution</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NutanixSSP Utilities" source="b220ce2d4f100300cee253418110c770">b220ce2d4f100300cee253418110c770</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="NutanixSSP Utilities">b220ce2d4f100300cee253418110c770</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_305042ad4f100300cee253418110c7ab</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-07-31 20:35:37</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
